author: Revolutionary-Ad9411
text:
Im curiousâ€¦ why the Alvarez goal from the keeper error at #69?

I mean I get that everyone has a different opinion ofcourseâ€¦ but im extremely surprised to see some like the Casemiro way way down before even the penalties, and then one like #69 which is mostly down to a catastrophic keeper error and a little hard work.

Just trying to understand from what perspective you are looking at both of those.

author: SportsRadioAnnouncer
text:
For 69, I thought it was pretty impressive to get a steal like that. Admittedly, I had a hard time deciding where to rank that one and 68.

The Casemiro one was deflected which is why it is so low.
